  Anyone else notice that experience points don't seem to be given 
out with equal value?
  My soldier has 900k xp after 800 kills, but my fire elemental only 
has 700k xp after 4000 kills.  I know not all monsters are created 
equal, but that's a little extreme.
  Do different classes get different experience from their kills?
